General_Description: '''The Call of Death''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: On a [[message board]], Kassandra found a note about a contract: "[[Sparta]]'s [[Spartan army|military]] poses too powerful a threat for an enemy state and must be weakened." – [[Nation Leader|Leader]] of (region)
Section_Outcome: Kassandra sought out and slew Spartan [[soldier]]s in the region, gaining rewards for doing this.
Section_Behind_the_scenes: This very same contract appears also under the names [[The Bloody Land]] and [[Spartan Blood]].
